    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)

      • create

        public void create()
        Send the initial creation packets for this scoreboard. Must be called at least once.

      • update

        public void update()
        Send the packets to update this scoreboard. A scoreboard must be created using create() in order to be used

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Send the packets to remove this scoreboard. A destroyed scoreboard sign must be recreated using create() in order to be used again

      • isCreated

        public boolean isCreated()

      • setLine

        public void setLine(int line,
                    java.lang.String value)
        Change a scoreboard line and send the packets to the player. Can be called async.
        Parameters:
        line - the number of the line (0 > line <= 15)
        value - the new value for the scoreboard line

      • removeLine

        public void removeLine(int line)
        Remove a given scoreboard line
        Parameters:
        line - the line to remove

      • getLineValue

        public java.lang.String getLineValue(int line)
        Get the current value for a line
        Parameters:
        line - the line
        Returns:
        the content of the line
